content.rendered:
Happy 15th Birthday, Johnson Consulting! 

What started with a few M&A deals back in 2000 has grown and progressed to a full service funeral home and cemetery consulting firm with over 500 years of experience and limitless possibilities.

excerpt.rendered: Happy 15th Birthday, Johnson Consulting!  What started with a few M&A deals back in 2000 has grown and progressed to a full service funeral home and cemetery consulting firm with over 500 years of experience and limitless possibilities.
